DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age & either sex , race Willing able follow instruction attend study visit Positive history ocular allergy Reproducible positive ocular allergic reaction induce conjunctival allergen challenge Have plan surgery trial period Female currently pregnant , plan pregnancy , lactate Use disallow medication
